Prebon

"I don't under estimate them. I didn't expect to control all maxis 
with just the chip. I have other things. The chip is just the first 
step. And they will fall. Don't worry."

Prebon smiled as Spears curled up to him. This must be driving 
Striker wild! But than the unthinkable happened. Striker attacked! 
The first shot Prebon was able to dodge partially, clipping him in 
the side of the head, starting mech fluid to run down his face. He 
cried.

"No Spears!" He flung her out of the way of the rest of the blasts. 
He was overcome with rage.

"I was hoping I didn't have to do this! BECOME ONE OF US!"

Prebon pulled out The Tamer(Prebon provides the arms of Tamron, so 
The gun is with him.). He pressed a few buttons and loaded a chip.

"Now serve your Lord Prebon!"

Prebon launched the chip.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream found the battle sight, and found a group of Alliance 
membres. He headed over to them.

"Hi, I'm Starscream of the Preds. I'm sort of doing Ambassador work, 
and I've gotta help you guys. What's going on?"
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

"Great. I'll be right there." Gotron took off for Wheeljack's 
position.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix became Irate with the laziness of the group.

"RATCHER, BLUESTREAK AND ANDROMEDA! COME AND HELP US INSTALL THE 
COMPUTER BOARDS!"
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois set Child down on a small table, and than looked at The Sky 
Scorchers.

"Come, bring the body into Windrazor's quarters. I will perform the 
burial there." He entered Windrazor's quarters.
